LanguageData.Rats.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.Rats.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.Rats.showmessages.label: Show messages
LanguageData.Rats.showmessages.tooltip: Shows a message when rats spawn on an item in the home-area
LanguageData.Rats.dessicated.label: Spawn rats from dessicated corpses
LanguageData.Rats.dessicated.tooltip: If unchecked rats will only spawn from corpses if they are not dessicated
LanguageData.Rats.biome.label: Respect biome definitions
LanguageData.Rats.biome.tooltip: If checked, only rats that is defined as valid for the current biome will spawn
LanguageData.Rats.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.Rats.maxrats.label: Maximum rats to spawn at one time: {0}
LanguageData.Rats.maxperday.label: Maximum rats to spawn per day: {0}
LanguageData.Rats.maxtotalrats.label: Maximum rats per map (0 = no limit): {0}
LanguageData.Rats.percentscaria.label: Rats spawning with scaria: {0}%
LanguageData.Rats.percentsterile.label: Rats spawning sterile: {0}%
LanguageData.Rats.rotdays.label: Will spawn on things that normally rots in {0} days
LanguageData.Rats.mindays.label: Will spawn on things have been unrefridgerated for at least {0} days
LanguageData.Rats.spawn.label: Spawn
LanguageData.Rats.inside.label: Inside
LanguageData.Rats.foodonly.label: Only Corpses
LanguageData.Rats.corpseonly.label: Only Food
